page.title: 20Summary and Credits,Snape.
page.content:
The area around Snape is not changing a great deal. New houses are being built in the village itself and families new to the area have moved in particularly over the last 10 years. The Village School children felt they did not want the village to change, but would like to see one or two additions, such as a library, play school and a small cafe. Whether the plans to upgrade a nearby main road into Wensleydale and the arrival of three fighter squadrons at R.A.F Leeming, will affect life in the village, only time will tell.
Compiled by the children of Snape County Primary School North Yorkshire.
